casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Jeremy Wesley CLAY, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 156990
COA: 339081 Supreme Court of Michigan. May 28, 2019

Order

On order of the Court, the motion for reconsideration of this Court's September 12, 2018 order is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that reconsideration of our previous order is warranted. MCR 7.311(G). The motion to amend is DENIED.
